trans-unit.source: Specifies information about the size and visibility of the images and label associated with a Ribbon control.
trans-unit.target: 指定的大小和映像和標籤功能區控制項相關聯的可見性的相關資訊。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Ribbon Layout and Resizing](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[功能區配置和調整大小](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControlSizeDefinition"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControlSizeDefinition"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Returns a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControlSizeDefinition"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 傳回的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControlSizeDefinition"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: The new instance of this class.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates how to show the image on a control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出如何在控制項上顯示影像。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon> control can display a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonImageSize> image, a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonImageSize> image, or the image can be <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonImageSize>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon>控制項可以顯示的<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonImageSize>影像、<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonImageSize>影像可以是<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonImageSize>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonImageSize> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonImageSize> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonImageSize> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.Ribbon>

trans-unit.source: If the control does not specify an image of the size that corresponds to the ImageSize setting, no image is displayed.
trans-unit.target: 如果控制項未指定對應於 ImageSize 設定之大小的映像，不會顯示影像。

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 相依性屬性資訊 | | | |-|-| |識別項欄位 || |中繼資料屬性設定為`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: One of the enumeration values that specify how to show the image on a control.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個列舉值，指定如何在控制項上顯示影像。

trans-unit.source: The registered default is <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonImageSize"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 已註冊的預設值是<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonImageSize"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: For more information about what can influence the value, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關什麼可能會影響該值的詳細資訊，請參閱[相依性屬性的值優先順序](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControlSizeDefinition.ImageSize*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControlSizeDefinition.ImageSize*>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControlSizeDefinition.ImageSize*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether a control is collapsed.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否要摺疊控制項。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if a control is collapsed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果控制項已摺疊。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControlSizeDefinition.IsCollapsed*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControlSizeDefinition.IsCollapsed*>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControlSizeDefinition.IsCollapsed*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the control’s label is visible.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出控制項的標籤是否可見。

trans-unit.source: If the label property of the control is not set, no label will be shown even if the IsLabelVisible property is `true`.
trans-unit.target: 即使 IsLabelVisible 屬性是，如果未設定控制項的 label 屬性，會顯示任何標籤`true`。

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 相依性屬性資訊 | | | |-|-| |識別項欄位 || |中繼資料屬性設定為`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the control’s label is visible; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>控制項的標籤是否可見的。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The registered default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 已註冊的預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: For more information about what can influence the value, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關什麼可能會影響該值的詳細資訊，請參閱[相依性屬性的值優先順序](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControlSizeDefinition.IsLabelVisible*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControlSizeDefinition.IsLabelVisible*>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControlSizeDefinition.IsLabelVisible*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the maximum width constraint of a container control in a Ribbon.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定容器控制項的最大寬度限制在功能區中。

trans-unit.source: This property only has an effect if the control is a container for other objects.
trans-unit.target: 如果控制項是其他物件的容器，這個屬性只會具有效果。

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 相依性屬性資訊 | | | |-|-| |識別項欄位 || |中繼資料屬性設定為`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: The maximum width of the control.
trans-unit.target: 控制項的最大寬度。

trans-unit.source: The registered default is <xref:System.Double.PositiveInfinity?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 已註冊的預設值是<xref:System.Double.PositiveInfinity?displayProperty=fullName>。

trans-unit.source: For more information about what can influence the value, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關什麼可能會影響該值的詳細資訊，請參閱[相依性屬性的值優先順序](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControlSizeDefinition.MaxWidth*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControlSizeDefinition.MaxWidth*>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControlSizeDefinition.MaxWidth*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the minimum width constraint of a container control in a Ribbon.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定容器控制項的最小寬度限制在功能區中。

trans-unit.source: This property only has an effect if the control is a container for other objects.
trans-unit.target: 如果控制項是其他物件的容器，這個屬性只會具有效果。

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 相依性屬性資訊 | | | |-|-| |識別項欄位 || |中繼資料屬性設定為`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: The minimum width of the control.
trans-unit.target: 控制項的最小寬度。

trans-unit.source: The registered default is 0.
trans-unit.target: 已註冊的預設值為 0。

trans-unit.source: For more information about what can influence the value, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關什麼可能會影響該值的詳細資訊，請參閱[相依性屬性的值優先順序](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControlSizeDefinition.MinWidth*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControlSizeDefinition.MinWidth*>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControlSizeDefinition.MinWidth*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the width of a container control in a Ribbon.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定功能區中的容器控制項的寬度。

trans-unit.source: This property only has an effect if the control is a container for other objects.
trans-unit.target: 如果控制項是其他物件的容器，這個屬性只會具有效果。

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 相依性屬性資訊 | | | |-|-| |識別項欄位 || |中繼資料屬性設定為`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: The width of the control.
trans-unit.target: 控制項的寬度。

trans-unit.source: The registered default is <xref:System.Windows.GridLength.Auto*>.
trans-unit.target: 已註冊的預設值為<xref:System.Windows.GridLength.Auto*>.</xref:System.Windows.GridLength.Auto*>

trans-unit.source: For more information about what can influence the value, see [Dependency Property Value Precedence](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關什麼可能會影響該值的詳細資訊，請參閱[相依性屬性的值優先順序](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControlSizeDefinition.Width*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControlSizeDefinition.Width*>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Ribbon.RibbonControlSizeDefinition.Width*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。
